name: Archaeostudies
description: The past holds technological secrets that yearn to be unveiled.

name: Biology
description: The science of life, in its many forms and complexities.

name: Computing
description: The science of applied algorithms.

name: Field Manipulation
description: Bending fundamental forces to our will.

name: Industry
description: Ingenuity and productivity.

name: Materials
description: The creation and manipulation of materials for increased utility and durability.

name: Military Theory
description: The art of war and its many important aspects.

name: New Worlds
description: Colonization protocols and pioneer training.

name: Null Void Beam
description: By harnessing the entropic nature of the Null Void, this beam can actually destroy energy.

name: Particles
description: Isolating and utilizing particulate matter and phenomena.

name: Propulsion
description: The study of propulsion and trajectory.

name: Psionics
description: Mind over matter.

name: Statecraft
description: The art of building a successful society.

name: Entropic Recursion
description: The universe tends irresistibly onwards and downwards. That tendency cannot be reversed... but it can be subverted, for a price.

name: Doctrine: Strange Loop
description: A set of social protocols based on paradoxical intuition, and on love. When we know the System of the Loop, we learn that we can influence by receiving instructions, as well as giving them.

name: Alien Topography
description: Civilizations flourish in locations that promotes growth, and by analyzing where the majority of pre-FTL settlements thrive we can gain more out of our colonies.

name: Amoeba Breeding Program
description: By breeding Space Amoebas in captivity, we can program their symbiotic flagella to act as organic strike craft for our navy.

name: Atmospheric Orbital Mechanics
description: Due to our vast experience operating observation stations in orbit of pre-FTL worlds, we have discovered slight optimizations. By implementing them empire-wide, we can drastically reduce the maintenance our stations require.

name: Star Cracker
description: PLANET_KILLER_STAR_CRACKER_DESC

name: Colossi
description: Advances in mega-engineering blur the lines between reality and fantasy in the form of Colossus-type military vessels. These immense, single-weapon platforms are capable of radically altering or obliterating entire worlds at the push of a button.

name: Compact Living
description: While no one civilization has the perfect solution to the ever-expanding challenge of governing a growing nation, we have found a partial solution. After studying a multitude of species and governments, we have discovered an outstanding balance of flexibility and function.

name: tech_cosmogenesis_FE_titan
description: tech_cosmogenesis_FE_titan_desc

name: Enigma Battlecruiser
description: Another optimized spacecraft, this time of larger dimensions, will make current Battleships look like toys.

name: Exponential Learning Theory
description: The radical shift in perspective required to comprehend the infinite layers of reality challenges even our most brilliant minds.

name: Gravitic Brush
description: Gravity and spacetime shape the universe. Starting with gravity, we will master tools to power our ascension.

name: Theoretical Infinity Thesis
description: Precise and incredibly minute alterations in gravity allow us to inject commands into the code of reality. Extreme caution is imperative as we learn the applications of this new and incredible tool.

name: The Rules of Reality
description: Recent experiments confirm that our edits to reality are only temporary. More significant alterations will be necessary to anchor these changes.

name: Nascent Universes
description: Large-scale travel to different universes is a daunting task. We must engineer a spacecraft that can not only pierce the fabric of spacetime but also survive the journey.

name: Riddle Escort
description: A starship of modest size that optimizes our knowledge of spacetime to enact dimensional transcendentalism, making the inside bigger than its outward shape suggests. Advanced firepower capabilities come at a reduced logistical cost compared to traditional ship designs.

name: Scalable Reservoir Computing
description: Colossal in scale, the Synaptic Lathe is a reservoir computer. The processing power of our population's networked minds is used to compute and store data. The benefits are obvious, but some misguided species may view the transmutation of individuals into computing chips as morally questionable.

name: COMPOSER_MARK
description: We have discovered how to let psionic energy flow through our ships. Armed with this knowledge, we can now imbue our vessels with the powers of our patron.

name: EATER_MARK
description: We have discovered how to let psionic energy flow through our ships. Armed with this knowledge, we can now imbue our vessels with the powers of our patron.

name: INSTRUMENT_MARK
description: We have discovered how to let psionic energy flow through our ships. Armed with this knowledge, we can now imbue our vessels with the powers of our patron.

name: WHISPERERS_MARK
description: We have discovered how to let psionic energy flow through our ships. Armed with this knowledge, we can now imbue our vessels with the powers of our patron.

name: Crystal-Infused Plating
description: By infusing armor plating with Crystalline matter we are able to further increase the durability of our ships' protective hulls.
weight_modifiers: (+1.0) Has the crystal_armor_1_weight country flag

name: Crystal-Forged Plating
description: Introducing Crystalline matter into the forging process further improves the ultra-hard qualities of crystal-infused metals.

name: Artificial Dragonscales
description: The Ether Drake's scales are made up of multiple layers of unique mineral nanostructures. Unorthodox manufacturing techniques allow us to closely emulate these self-repairing structures.

name: Dyson Sphere
description: dyson_sphere_0_MEGASTRUCTURE_DETAILS

name: Enigmatic Decoder
description: While producing average results in standard tests, the accuracy of Enigmatic Decoder's prediction algorithms seemingly increases as the target's flight path grows more erratic.

name: Enigmatic Encoder
description: The Enigmatic Encoder scrambles flight path data according to some indeterminable design before feeding it back to fleet command.

name: Extradimensional Weaponry
description: Applying 5th-dimensional energy manipulation principles on lower dimensional planes allows for the creation of powerful energy weapons.
weight_modifiers: (×0.0) Does NOT have the Covenant: End of the Cycle modifier

name: Gargantuan Evolution
description: Voidspawn eggs have evolved to withstand the harsh conditions of space by absorbing and conserving energy from their nearest star.

name: Identity Copies
description: We will be able to copy the identity and memories of a Synthetic into a new mechanical body. The copies have predictable skill sets but make for stale conversation.

name: Leviathan Tech Genesis
description: Utilizing the received knowledge seized from Leviathans, we now have access to new improvements for our frames.

name: L-Gate Activation
description: The L-Gates defy our current understanding of subspace mechanics. This must be remedied before they can be opened for travel.
potential: Does NOT have the l_cluster_opened global flag

name: Lost Building Methods
description: Any civilization with a long enough history has examples of great wonders built by forgotten ancients which can no longer be replicated. Luckily for us we have documented these great ancients when they appeared on pre-FTL worlds.

name: Matter Decompressor
description: matter_decompressor_0_MEGASTRUCTURE_DETAILS

name: Mining Drone Lasers
description: Using intense-focus lenses in combination with an oscillating firing frequency help create lasers strong enough to mine asteroids, or shoot down hostiles.

name: Nanite Autocannon
description: Highly advanced autocannons capable of ejecting shells that explode into a cloud of nanites at the target, overwhelming shields and chewing through hull sections.

name: Nanite Flak Battery
description: Improving upon previous designs by launching canisters of nanites capable of eating away at strike craft, these flak batteries are the bane of any fighter pilot.

name: Nanite Repair System
description: A highly effective hull auto-repair system comprised of billions of microscopic nanomachines was found among the smoking remains of the Scavenger, and has been repurposed for our uses. Whether the Scavenger pilfered this system from an ancient derelict, or was originally constructed with it remains unknown.

name: Cetana's Nanites
description: Cetana's advanced nanite systems will tirelessly repair and refresh our ships at a rate far beyond our current capabilities.

name: Neural Tissue Engineering
description: When tailored to a species' genome, this form of tissue engineering has intensive neuroregenerative properties, significantly increasing the development of neurons, axons, and synapses in its recipient.

name: New Numbers
description: After studying multiple pre-FTL civilizations, we have realized that there are many alternative ways to calculate the universe. It has even introduced new numbers into our mathematics.

name: Orbital Trash Dispersal
description: This orbital bombardment management system spams a planet with millions of minute, high-velocity projectiles, overwhelming planetside defensive grids with trash data. Ships equipped with this component will cause more damage during orbital bombardment.

name: Ordered Retreat
description: While studying the victors of battles might be the most obvious way to gain insight from combat, observing the loser on pre-FTL worlds has taught us how to organize our withdraws more effectively.

name: Predatory Tactics
description: Just like how clever pre-FTLs move to conceal each other as they approach an enemy, so too can our pilots move faster without disrupting their cloaking field.

name: Numistic Data Modeling
description: Are the precognitive powers of Numa at work or is it a matter of skilled craftsmanship? Either way this galactic stock market prediction model will forecast fluctuations in the economy with divine accuracy.

name: Psionic Barrier
description: These barriers are generated out of pure psychic energy by a cadre of psionic specialists. They will be able to stop some incoming fire, like our Energy deflector systems, but without the prohibitive power consumption.

name: Psionic Shields
description: These extremely powerful shields are generated out of pure psychic energy by a cadre of psionic specialists. Their powers are further augmented by large arrays of psi emitters.

name: Regenerative Hull Tissue
description: A genetically altered version of silicon-based bacteria could potentially be manipulated to regenerate non-organic materials.

name: Rift Sphere
description: It seems that space and time tend to gather together in layers, all laid on top of one another. The trick is how to slip between the folds.

name: Ring Segment
description: ring_world_1_MEGASTRUCTURE_DETAILS

name: Satisfying Insults
description: Nothing is quite as powerful as a well-placed insult, and we now know how to insult a species's progenitor in many languages.

name: Scourge Missiles
description: By analyzing the biological weaponry employed by the Swarm we can create self-propelled projectiles weapons spreading the very same horrific destruction.

name: Baol Organic Plant
description: The Baol Organism had a unique way of producing tools. Given the species' relative slowness, they would simply grow them out of organic matter in locations that were half orchard, half factory. With the proper genetic adjustments, we could also grow various commodities and tools alongside our regular crops.
potential: Has DLC Ancient Relics Story Pack

name: Cybrex Mining Hub
description: To build their ring world, the Cybrex relied on highly efficient mining drones to survey and harvest orbital resources. Cybrex-made memory chips and sensors could outfit our own mining drones, so that we might put their millennia old algorithms to good use.
potential: Has DLC Ancient Relics Story Pack

name: Irassian Naval Yards
description: The Irassian astronaval tradition was unmatched in their time. Their shipyards produced a constant stream of ships for their navy and merchant fleets, which would ultimately be their downfall. With so many ships, and such a high reliance on them, the Irassians were powerless to quarantine the disease that would claim their empire.
potential: Has DLC Ancient Relics Story Pack

name: First League Filing Offices
description: The sprawling empire of the First League dwarfed our own at its peak, and relied on implacable bureaucracy to keep the wheels of the state in motion. The quantic filing arrays they used afforded them unprecedented efficiency in the sorting and storing of documents.
potential: Has DLC Ancient Relics Story Pack

name: Vultaum Reality Computer
description: The reality computers of the Vultaums were unique processing units, dedicated to analyzing existence itself, not quite through physics, but rather by trying to reverse engineer reality's source code and find the glitch that would finally allow the Vultaums to take down the simulation where they believed they lived.
potential: Has DLC Ancient Relics Story Pack

name: Yuht Astronomical Interferometer
description: The Yuht were a paradoxical society, obsessed with the idea of finding other sentient species, yet refusing to accept that they were not alone. They were so focused on disproving any claim of alien life, that their bias found a way into their technology. However, with the proper modifications and calibrations, we could certainly fix their powerful detection arrays.
potential: Has DLC Ancient Relics Story Pack

name: Zroni Storm Caster
description: Zro is a fascinating element, prone to chaotic bursts of energy. We believe that with the right artifacts, we could use it to fuel spatial storms over entire solar systems.
potential: Has DLC Ancient Relics Story Pack

name: Cloud Lightning Conduits
description: Void Clouds use the electrical charges generated by the dense gases that make up most of their core to release bolts of burning plasma. Using the same gas composition together with a specialized conduit allows for powerful lightning weaponry.

name: Frequency Tuning
description: Adapting the Tiyanki method of siphoning energy from gaseous matter, it is possible to construct weapons draining energy from enemy ships.

name: Skravird Strike Craft
description: Learning from the design expertise of Skrand and his people, these superior strike craft are capable of prolonged engagement and highly adaptive tactics.

name: Subspace Drive
description: An insight borne of a desperate desire to leave our home, these Subspace Drive engines were designed to facilitate limited interstellar travel. While only allowing small-scale jumps, they provide a unique opportunity to jumpstart our galactic exploration.

name: Supreme Alloy
description: What we thought was the greatest alloy turned out to be far from the truth. Countless pre-FTL refining processes have been cataloged, and we have now synthesized an unbeatable metal.

name: Swarm Spawning Pools
description: Collecting specimens from defeated Prethoryn enables us to clone and genetically program a war-brood of our own.

name: Temple of Transportation
description: Transportation networks bring people together: a sentiment shared by many civilization we observed. While we do not have steam engines, our hyper relay networks could serve a similar purpose.

name: Trinary Computing
description: Different societies have developed alternative solutions for their logistics and computing. These alien ways of thinking have made it easier for us to adapt to foreign empires' structures.

name: Unusual Senses
description: Nothing is more innovative than natural evolution. By studying how pre-FTL societies view their world, we have devised new methods of detecting uninvited ships.

name: Xeno-Aesthetics
description: After analyzing a multitude of artists from drastically different cultures, we have come up with a general theorem. By studying a civilization's art and culture, we can gain an advantage against them in combat.

name: Xeno-Linguistics
description: Given recent encounters with intelligent races, it is essential that we improve our xeno-linguistic capabilities.
weight_modifiers:
(+1.0) All must be true
• null
• One must be true
• Is of country type: default
• Is of country type: awakened_marauders
• Is of country type: COUNTRY_FALLEN_EMPIRE
• Is of country type: COUNTRY_AWAKENED_FALLEN_EMPIRE
• Does NOT have Gestalt Consciousness Ethic
• is_homicidal=no
• Does NOT have Gestalt Consciousness Ethic
• perc_communications_with_playable>0

Does NOT have Gestalt Consciousness Ethic

name: Voidcraft
description: Space is the final frontier. To master it is to master the future.
